setup.title: Setup Guides
setup.subtitle: Follow these step-by-step instructions to connect your devices to PixieGuard.

android.step1Desc: Download and install the official WireGuard app from the Google Play Store.
android.step2Desc: Open WireGuard, tap the + button, and select 'Scan from QR code' or 'Import from file'.
android.step3Desc: Toggle the switch next to your tunnel to connect. You may need to approve the VPN permission.

ios.step1Desc: Download and install the official WireGuard app from the App Store.
ios.step2Desc: Open WireGuard, tap 'Add a tunnel', and choose 'Create from QR code' or 'Create from file'.
ios.step3Desc: Toggle the switch to connect. Allow VPN configuration when prompted.

windows.step1Desc: Download and install WireGuard from the official website (wireguard.com/install).
windows.step2Desc: Click 'Import tunnel(s) from file' and select your downloaded .conf file.
windows.step3Desc: Select your tunnel and click 'Activate' to connect to the VPN.

mac.step1Desc: Download WireGuard from the Mac App Store or use Homebrew: brew install wireguard-tools.
mac.step2Desc: Open WireGuard, click 'Import tunnel(s) from file' and select your .conf file.
mac.step3Desc: Click 'Activate' to establish the VPN connection.
